item.title: Chromecast+TTS = Party: PA.js
item.description: I put this together in an afternoon hack session and was planning to extend it and clean up the code. However, its been months and the holidays are rolling around and it’s yet to be published! I wanted to put out a small writeup how to harness your Chromecasts for home automation, scripting, and fun. Back at my previous job, we had installed Chromecasts throughout the building hooked up to speakers and TVs.
